short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ITV Kerching The Discount Thing is your ultimate shopping companion that makes it easier to save money.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you're shopping for the newest fashion trends or the latest gadgets, enjoy incredible savings on all your daily essentials. As you browse online at selected stores, discount codes will appear to alert you to the deals at that store.

How it works
The ITV Kerching extension automatically finds discounts on the UKâ€™s favourite brands. Whenever you visit a shopping site, ITV Kerching immediately checks for available deals. Get instant notifications when a coupon code is available. Add the ITV Kerching extension to Chrome and start saving money today.

ITV Kerching is exclusively operated by Kindred Soul Ltd. Discounts are not guaranteed and are subject to retailer conditions. Only available on supported browsers and devices. By installing ITV Kerching you agree to the T&Cs (https://event.kindred.co/kerchingtc), confirm you are 18+ and have read the privacy notice (https://event.kindred.co/itv-privacy-policy). For more information, visit the ITV Kerching FAQs (https://event.kindred.co/kerchingfaq).
